kreport.name: fbForecloseRate_zh

condition.name: deptId
condition.extend: select v_o.id,v_o.org_name from v_org v_o where v_o.type='分部' and v_o.area in(${s@user_areas}) order by v_o.type_order,v_o.org_order

condition.name: earea
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='区域' and d.dvalue in (${s@user_areas}) and d.dvalue>=20 and d.dvalue<800 order by d.ordernum

condition.name: area
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='区域' order by d.ordernum

condition.name: relationsys
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='涉及系统' order by d.ordernum

data.tbody: ${0} ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5} ${6} ${7} ${8}

kreport.ksql: --直接回单清单 select distinct v_o.org_name 分部, f.serialno 工单编号, f.title 工单标题, to_char(f.gendate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') 报障时间, i.organiger 报障人, i.organigerdept 报障部门, rend(i.area) 区域, i.faultdescription 故障描述 from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n,v_org v_o where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and v_o.id=n.executergrouporgid and v_o.type='分部' and f.status!='XJ' and n.nodecode='8705e3d30a112268006ecb0498438858' --IT分部接口 and n.status='YB' and not exists( select 1 from rec_node n1,rec_node n2 where n1.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and n2.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and n1.nodelsh=n2.prenodelsh and n2.preroutecode in( '871581c50a112268002e1b03d5bb18c3', --转业务支持中心 '871605de0a1122680005e6411105e5d9', --转省IT中心协助 '56750a8d0a11221100ca4c95630e4872', --派电子运维 '9767c6030a1122110106173bbdc058ab' --派厂家 ) ) #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and i.area=${area}] #[and i.replytime>=${startDate}] #[and i.replytime<${endDate}] #[and n.executergrouporgname=${org_name}] #[and v_o.id=${deptId}] #[and v_o.area=${earea}] #[--${earea}]#[and v_o.area in(${s@user_areas})] #[and exists(select 1 from ins_frm_sub_namevalue s where i.relationsys=s.parentrelid and s.fieldvalue=${relationsys})]
